caption.p: Antiviral activity of hits against SARS-CoV-2 and the comparison with recently reported M pro inhibitors.

table-wrap-foot.p: aCPE EC 50, VYR EC 90, and cytotoxicity CC 50 values are means ± SD of 3 independent experiments.

bResults were retrieved from recent publications.
8, 10, 11
cThe antiviral activity of ebselen was determined in plaque assay.
